interpretation: The "satellite antenna" card represents the search for knowledge and information. Just as a satellite antenna receives signals from far-off places, this card suggests that you should be open to receiving new ideas and insights from unexpected sources. This card may also indicate a need for communication and connection with others, as well as a desire to expand your horizons and explore new territories. Keywords associated with this card include: information, communication, exploration, curiosity, and connection. When this card appears in a reading, it may suggest that it's time to broaden your perspective and seek out new opportunities for learning and growth. It may also indicate a need to stay connected with others and to communicate your ideas and thoughts effectively. Overall, the "satellite antenna" card reminds us to stay open to new experiences and to embrace the power of knowledge and connection.
